${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:NineTailsRelic.NAME: Nine Tails Relic
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you die, lose #b%d #ptail and #y%d max HP.

${modID}:TailOfFury.NAME: Tail Of Fury
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d strength immediately and at the start of each combat.

${modID}:TailOfAgility.NAME: Tail Of Agility
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d dexterity immediately and at the start of each combat.

${modID}:TailOfEnergy.NAME: Tail Of Energy
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d energy and become weakened for #y%d turn at the start of each combat.
